modShortDescription: This mod will allow cars, army trucks, service trucks, ambulances and buses to respawn to a similar vehicle after a few hours.
modDescription:
This mod will allow cars, army trucks, service trucks, ambulances and buses to [respawn](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-respawn/) to a similar vehicle after a few hours.

* Cars will respawn to a random car (with a random stage of damage)
* Army trucks (open or closed) will respawn to a randomly open or closed army truck
* Service trucks and ambulances are grouped together to respawn each other
* Big buses will respawn big buses, the short school bus will respawn itself â€“ to avoid respawning through parts of buildings.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/saminal1/samsmods-a20/tree/main/SCarRespawner)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/25850-sams-car-and-truck-respawner-a20/).

**Credits:** [Saminal](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/saminal/)
